SELECT op_r.id, op_r.remote_addr, op_r.params, op_r.method, op_r.create_time, op_r.is_success, IFNULL(u.username, '未知') AS username, IFNULL( p.`name`, op_r.request_url ) AS permName FROM t_operate_record AS op_r LEFT JOIN t_user AS u ON op_r.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_permission AS p ON op_r.request_url = p.url WHERE (1 = 1)
AND (op_r.requestUrl LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.keyword},'%') OR op_r.remoteAddr LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.keyword},'%') OR op_r.method LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.keyword},'%') OR op_r.flag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.keyword},'%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.keyword},'%'))
ORDER BY op_r.create_time DESC

SELECT rec.method, COUNT(*) AS total, '1' AS type FROM `t_operate_record` AS rec GROUP BY rec.method UNION ALL SELECT u.nickname AS Na, COUNT(*) AS total, '2' AS type FROM sys_operating_record AS rec1 INNER JOIN sys_user u ON rec1.uid = u.id GROUP BY u.nickname UNION ALL SELECT '未知' AS Na, COUNT(*) AS total, '2' AS type FROM sys_operating_record AS rec2 WHERE rec2.uid IS NULL OR rec2.uid NOT IN (SELECT id FROM sys_user)
